features: Comprehensive Finance Management: From budget and net worth to tax documentation.; Expense and Income Management: Track your spending and income, monitor your budget, and set targets.; Effective Budgeting: Develop and manage budgets for your income and expenses.; Net Worth and Advanced Finance: Monitor your net worth and receive advanced financial insights.; Financial Ratio Calculations: Automatically calculate seven key financial ratios.; Tracking and Monitoring of Assets and Liabilities: Keep a close eye on your assets and liabilities to understand your financial position better.; Tax and Insurance Documentation: Maintain records and keep track of your taxes and insurance.; Financial Goal Tracking: Monitor your financial goals based on the value of your assets.; Categorisation Tools: Organise your expenses, income, assets, and liabilities.; Track your assets by category for a detailed financial overview.
